net.minecraftforge.client.resource

接口 ISelectiveResourceReloadListener

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ICustomModelLoader
    所有已知实现类:
    B3DLoader, CloudRenderer, ItemLayerModel.Loader, ModelDynBucket.LoaderDynBucket, ModelFluid.FluidLoader, MultiLayerModel.Loader, OBJLoader

    public interface ISelectiveResourceReloadListener

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void func_110549_a(IResourceManager resourceManager) 
      void onResourceManagerReload(IResourceManager resourceManager, java.util.function.Predicate<IResourceType> resourcePredicate)
      A version of onResourceManager that selectively chooses IResourceTypes to reload.

    • 方法详细资料

      • func_110549_a

        default void func_110549_a(IResourceManager resourceManager)

      • onResourceManagerReload

        void onResourceManagerReload(IResourceManager resourceManager,
                             java.util.function.Predicate<IResourceType> resourcePredicate)
        A version of onResourceManager that selectively chooses IResourceTypes to reload. When using this, the given predicate should be called to ensure the relevant resources should be reloaded at this time.
        参数:
        resourceManager - the resource manager being reloaded
        resourcePredicate - predicate to test whether any given resource type should be reloaded
